parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: (Size of the array returned by IPartDoc::AddPropertyExtension ) - (Position of the property extension in the array) (see Remarks )

title: IPartDoc.GetPropertyExtension
description: Gets the specified property extension on this part document.

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: (Size of the array returned by IPartDoc::AddPropertyExtension ) - (Position of the property extension in the array) (see Remarks )

remarks:
IPartDoc::AddPropertyExtension adds property extensions to a last-in-first-out, 1-based array and returns the size of that array. See the examples in
Example
.
NOTE
: SOLIDWORKS recommends that you use the
IAttribute
,
IAttributeDef
, and
IParameter
interfaces instead of this method. These interfaces provide more flexibility.
